Entries.haley_photo: %{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HaleyName}}'s too involved with her camera to notice you.
Entries.shane_work: %{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneName}}'s hard at work. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneGender}}}} doesn't seem interested in talking.
Entries.marnie_exercise: %{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}} smiles at you through a mist of sweat.
Entries.vincent_read_right: Ms. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}} says I have to read this book before I can go play.$s
Entries.sam_work: %{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamName}}'s on the clock... better not get {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamGender}}}} in trouble.
